ovdesc.p: The table is used to define accounting entries which need to be captured and stored for recycling.

Typical entries to capture will be debit entries against a customer account where funds are not available and the account would move into debit. It is possible that only certain types of customer account or certain transaction types need to be captured. For example all transactions against a savings account that is legally not allowed to go into debit, including COB based periodic charges; some types of account may go into debit for periodic charges but not for loan repayments or payments into savings deposits.
The entry will first check against the product category and if it passes then the checks against system id will be made.
The set up allows different core API routines to handle different message types.

This field is maintained at the product level to decide if AC.LOCKED.EVENTS record has to be created, when cycler captures a debit transaction for retry at a later date

When this field is set to 'NO' AC.LOCKED.EVENTS would not be created during capture process
